document_data.name: Yulius
document_data.mainbody: '''Yulius''' was a domesticated [[displacer beast]] that remained in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The beast may have originally dwelt in Myth Drannor before its destruction as the companion of a resident, but one way or another (such as the rampant rifts through time in the temple) ultimately ended up in the ruins of the [[Throne of Thought]] in the 14{{th}} century DR.
